duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead, develop, and maintain strategic relationships with Crewmembers, internal departments, and Customers.
Oversee and support Crewmembers responsible for the execution of the Airport operation.
Monitor and execute safety and security programs at the station.
Resolve and handle escalated issues with Customers and/or Crewmembers.
Coach, train, and encourage engagement of Airports Crewmembers.
Identify operational challenges and implement improvements to maximize and ensure success of on-time performance initiatives.
Support Management in the execution of the operational strategy.
Direct and guide Airports Crewmembers through operational issues.
Ensure policies and procedures are conducted in accordance with System Airports Performance and Quality (SAPQ) and applicable federal regulations and standards.
Evaluate daily Crewmember shift schedules and assignments to ensure maximum efficiency.
Fulfill frontline duties, assist in supporting Frontline Crewmembers, and perform administrative support as assigned.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or General Education Diploma (GED)
